alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:24AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield, southwestern Lancaster and northwestern Kershaw Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1024 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winnsboro, moving east at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Lake Wateree Dam, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Longtown, Liberty Hill, Lake Wateree State Park, Ridgeway, Lebanon Fire Station, Fairfield County Detention Center, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, White Oak and Lake Wateree near Highway 97. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 33 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
